direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with IP restrictions for sub-account API keys, but one retrieves the current restrictions while the other updates them.
Both methods manage IP restrictions for sub-account API keys, but one updates the restrictions while the other deletes specific IPs from the list.
Both methods involve modifying sub-account settings, though they handle different aspects (IP restrictions vs. margin account enablement).
